 int[][][] Alignment.makePointer(float[][] table, Phrase p1, Phrase p2)
          Returns a 3-dim array of integers, denoting pointers between cells in the given table.
Example: pointers from cell (i,j):
LEFT pointer:
i = pointers[i][j][0]
j-1 = pointers[i][j][1]
UP pointer:
i-1 = pointers[i][j][2]
j = pointers[i][j][3]
LEFT/UP pointer:
i-1 = pointers[i][j][4]
j-1 = pointers[i][j][5]
